summary: TAKATA RECALL - PASSENGER FRONTAL AIRBAG INFLATOR COULD RUPTURE IF THE VEHICLE IS INVOLVED IN A CRASH WHERE THE SUPPLEMENTAL FRONTAL AIRBAGS ARE DESIGNED TO DEPLOY.   THIS HAS TAKEN  WAY TOO LONG. WE RECEIVED NOTIFICATION JULY 2016 - ONE YEAR AGO! WE ARE IN A VERY HUMID AREA AND THIS IS A CITY VEHICLE THAT HANDLES MOSQUITO CONTROL.  WE ARE IN MOSQUITO SEASON AND NEED THIS VEHICLE!
